name: Escape from Brackis 7
description:
Escape from Brackis 7 with your teammate. Unfortunately, your guns seized up when launching but you teammate still has his firepower.

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move.

Credits:

Coding: Scott

Additional Coding: Aaron

Art and Sounds: Most Assets from Unity Free Asset Store
